name: @ts-boost/boost
description: A statically-typed and functional library collection to assist development with TypeScript.
author: Frederik Krautwald <fkrautwald@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: lerna exec npm install && lerna bootstrap --hoist
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:lint: lerna exec -- ../../node_modules/.bin/prettier --write --print-width 100 --tab-width 2 --no-semi --single-quote --trailing-comma es5 --parser typescript src/*.ts src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.ts
